mapper.select: select c.*,s.cert_no,s.cert_date,s.valid_date,b.runScope as comRange,b.registerStatus as subsist from tb_company c left join tb_safety_certificate s on c.com_name = s.com_name left join mishu_next.cert_basic b on b.registerNo = c.org_code and b.companyName = c.com_name where 1=1 and c.com_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')

select c.*,s.cert_no,s.cert_date,s.valid_date,b.runScope as comRange,b.registerStatus as subsist from tb_company c left join tb_safety_certificate s on c.com_name = s.com_name left join mishu_next.cert_basic b on b.registerNo = c.org_code and b.companyName = c.com_name where 1=1 and c.com_id = #{comId} limit 1
select code from area where `name`=#{name} or display_name=#{name}
